author: cheche
msg: Pipeline within pipeline. Fix error ot of context

author: mrdon
msg: Merged struts-chain into Struts core.  The following was performed:
* ComposableRequestProcessor moved over to org.apache.struts.chain
* Commands moved to their own package - o.a.s.c.commands
* Chain plugin merged with ActionServlet
* ActionServlet now takes chainConfig init-param to specify csv
list of catalog configurations
* ControllerConfig now has two addition attributes - catalog and
command
* ComposableRequestProcessor now default request processor
* TilesPlugin detects ComposableRequestProcessor and doesn't replace
request processor with its own if found
* Chain legacy Actions moved to o.a.s.actions package
* chain-config.xml added to jar as default catalog
* commons-chain added as a dependency to maven (not ant pending build
refactoring
* removed unnecessary struts-chain sandbox project
Still todo:
* more testing.  Loaded new code with old Struts 1.1 app and it worked
with no modifications
* documentation update
* mark deprecations
* portlet versions of chain commands
